home.title: Welcome to the application for automatic creation and population of projects in Jira!
home.description1: Configure your new project in a few steps and let the app take care of the rest.
home.feature1: Fast generation of projects in Jira
home.feature2: Automatic addition of sprints, epics, and issues
home.feature3: Assigning issues to epics and sprints
home.feature4: You can create a new project or use your own
home.description3: Simply fill in the basic information in the form, and the app will handle creating all the necessary elements in Jira.

form.atlassianUserJiraUrl: Base url address of user's Jira (*.atlassian.net)
form.chatGptMessage: Write what project you want to create (e.g., a program for managing a kayak rental service)

processInProgress.message: Please be patient, the process may take a few minutes...

processSuccess.title: Operation completed successfully
processSuccess.message: You can now proceed to review the created project.
